"Liu Lin": "Well met. I'm Liu Lin. Moving along, I have things to tell you."
"I trust you're already familiar with what Cocoons are, but now I will tell you about how you can find other Cocoons."
"Before that, however, I will teach you about Ryuker Devices."
"I have sent coordinates over to your Mag. Please follow them to their destination."
"You must be one of the new ARKS members."
